name: Josephine Weber
text: Spectacular customer service , Erica was a wonderful waitress. The wine flight and avocado club roll was fantastic

name: DANIELLE YULE
text: Our server, Jon, was superb. Likeable personality, knowledgeable of the menu, and went above and beyond to help me get credit on my rewards card. In addition.... the Thai pizza is my favorite... and don't forget the sangria flight... 6 out of 5 stars üòâ

name: Rick Dukes
text: I have started a low carb diet and wanted to try the cauliflower crust pizza. Wow it was amazing! Thanks California Pizza Kitchen from all us low carb dieters!

name: Phil Rowland
text: Great food! Attentive and clean but it could use some charisma. Looked like the TV was stuck in a cycle of outdated sports. I liked this place though. The price was fair and i didnt come to watch TV anyway! Lol!

name: Brian Hutchens
text: Service was good, pizza was excellent. Drinks are slightly overpriced, but worth it

name: Tamie White
text: Was a nice atmosphere, our waitress was most helpful. Food was fresh and such a nice change of pace. Would highly recommend this place.

name: Jessica Moten
text: Wasn't blown away by the food, but the service was great!

name: James Murray
text: I had to cancel my take out order after noticing one employee, who appeared to be the manager,  helping prepare my food with his face mask pulled down exposing his nose. I understand it's probably not easy to wear face masks for extended periods of time but if you're not going to wear them properly why wear them at all?

name: Evelyn Mancuso
text: Great salad.  Good service.  Will return.

name: Chris O' Neal
text: Been going to California Pizza Kitchen for years in San Antonio, so happy to have one here in Franklin. You have to get some of the avocado and bacon egg rolls. So very tasty.

name: Lovely Michelle
text: As much as the pizza (had it come out on time and at least warm, but even cold hours later it managed to be good) warrants 5 stars the service and appetizers do not. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lindsey P
text: Great experience! Food was fantastic, service as great as well. I got the cauliflower crust pizza and it was so good! Eating areas were very clean as well which is always appreciated :)

name: Pat Patruno
text: I am originally from NY via Italy so i thonk i have a pretty good sense of what good pizza is. Once you get beyond the non traditional toppings for the pizza purists, my visit to this CPK was pleasantly surprising. I have visited other CPKs ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Brock
text: It was nice to eat indoors and service was excellent.

name: Stephanie Born
text: Our waiter, Orin, was super pleasant and prompt. We had the Works pizza with cauliflower crust and it was fantastic. Very good, definitely will be back. Crust was crispy and there were good amounts of toppings.

name: Ally Medina
text: Food was good. But the the wait after we ordered is ridiculous. Our waitress Elizabeth served my daughter a sweet tea in a cup that was completely cracked. When we brought it to her attention Elizabeth said my daughter did it... Just terrible customer service. Not worth the wait. Never returning.

name: Kev
text: The food was great and the service was too

name: Daniel Dingeldein
text: This place is okay. The food is good, the service is, unfortunately, is hit or miss. I've been in there and been waited on immediately and I've been in there for 20 minutes and not a soul, other than the hostess, say one word to me. So, I got up and left. I do enjoy their pizzas especially with their cauliflower crusts!

name: Jennifer Coleman
text: Food cold, others who sat down after us were served food first. No refills, no clearing of dirty dishes, and food was not as shown in menu. Skimpy vegetables way too much gummy rice. Service poor. I could go on. Very disappointed since I‚Äôve been to other California Pizza Kitchen restaurants and got much better everything!

name: Dee Dee
text: Atmosphere, service and food was all good/fine.  But.... the prices are ridiculous. We won't be going back in principle.  Prices are really high for what you get.

name: Stephanie Attanasio
text: Amazing cauliflower crust pizza! Crispy and delicious!

name: Alan Dash
text: Excellent food and wow, what a great staff.  The gal who waited on us took us through the menu, having not been there before.  We ordered 3 pizzas.  Normal cheese and pepperoni, a 5 cheese and tomato, and a BBQ. The best was the BBQ one. ‚Ä¶More

name: Catherine Brown
text: I love the food, but every time I go , I sit outside in the middle of the mall, next to the elevator. The bartenders out there are super aloof and rude. I‚Äôll try Green Hills next time.

name: Jordan Crothers
text: Everything was way overpriced, server seemed like she didn‚Äôt want to be there, and I‚Äôm not even sure if there was dessert because it wasn‚Äôt mentioned. The tiny pieces of bread they give you while you wait make you wonder if the place is ‚Ä¶More

name: Pat Pointer
text: Dear lord don‚Äôt order the pizza for home delivery. It‚Äôs $34 for a tiny 9‚Äù pizza and 6 dim sum. Buyer be aware.

name: Stephanie Wright
text: My pizza was great but there was so much crust it took away from the meal. The crust was hard and dry as well.

name: ash-john k
text: Tried this place for the first time after Cheesecake Factory failed to give service. Anyhow, we absolutely loved their food. Pizza is amazing. And the service is phenomenal. Definitely will be coming back!!

name: SOLID C0LD
text: got the chocolate cake to go. it was in a plastic box, which was put in a big bag. to my disgust, they put the toppings in small containers inside the box, which should've been put outside, in the bag, not touching my cake. i don't know why ‚Ä¶More

name: Reneshia Parker
text: Excellent service and food... Erica was awesome

name: Your Party
text: Something seriously wrong with this location , if you want the WORST customer service with subpar food come here . Messed up my order barely an apology and just wasted my time .  They should be ashamed of how they treat people

name: Laura Miller
text: We love CPK

name: Greg Mealer
text: Great place, a little understaffed but good luck finding employees in the Trump economy ! Fast the bar in the middle is efficient, good drafts.

name: jonathan purkey
text: I can't believe I can stay on Keto while enjoying a pizza this wonderful!!  The service is 2nd to none!

name: Will Joseph
text: Been here twice - food was great both times.  Service was great the first time, but the most recent time, the server wasn't as cordial as we would have expected.  But we will go back.

name: David Sutton
text: Good Pizza - would have been nice if instead of having elevator music on at the bar they turned up the Titans game  ( one they actually won btw :) )

name: Megan Daffron
text: Tried it out today for the first time around 2:30 on a Thursday. The food was really good but our waiter seemed a bit scattered (maybe he was new). He took our drink order and then came back a minute later because he forgot what it was. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessica Lentz
text: Had a takeout order.  Manager was super helpful!

name: Keith Mahorney
text: Had the Cobb salad and it was the very best. Service was good and all the food I saw looked top notch. Highly recommended.

name: Honesty
text: Terrible service, William was our waiter. He checked on us once, didn‚Äôt give us silverware when we went to go it ourselves it was dirty.Food was way too small for the huge price, he didn‚Äôt even tell us his name I had to find it on the ‚Ä¶More

name: Gaby Martorano
text: Cool restaurant,  the bar area is pretty neat!  The food is excellent and the service is great, definitely try it. Oh and they have more than just pizzas and everything we had was deeelish!!

name: Tami Shephard
text: As a girl from California, so dissatisfied.  I was so excited for this one to open up. The menu is nothing like California's menu.  Not alot of choice for pizza. A little bit pricey and the wait staff is to overwhelmed. The food we ordered was good. Needs more choices of pizzas.

name: Helen
text: Third time to try.  Ate in the atrium.  Cobb Salad was bland.  White wine was lukewarm 2 out of the 3 times.  Service ok.  Expensive prices.  Won't return.

name: Sallaya Chinratanalab
text: Service is awesome. We enjoy their bbq chicken pizza and we ordered Thai salad along with roasted veggie salad. We emptied every plate. Great service makes food taste good too.

name: Brad Hershberger
text: Very good pizzas and very good service. Friendly staff, too. Prices aren't bad, especially for being right in the mall.

name: Tilden Clark
text: Loved everything, except the flat bread.

name: C.Ann Sorrell
text: Food, service was excellent the only drawback was the bathroom...they seriously need to address their drain trap odor issue...

name: David Gould
text: Consistently good food and service.

name: Lois Light
text: Lots of new dishes to try.

name: Lisa Ballantyne
text: Love their Berry Sangria

name: Ajit Chauhan
text: No good food and very very expensive. Per head $23 and taste worst

name: O Miranda
text: A must in this neighborhood! Great food, Healthy! Amazing Service and kid friendly!

name: Michelle Pittman
text: Great food. Super service!

name: LaToya Jessie
text: The food and service is always A1!! I love this place!

name: George Angelopoulos
text: Atrium table recommended. Lunch duo was a great deal.

name: Hannah T.
text: I truly would never return. I went there for Mother‚Äôs Day this year and the service was awful! We were first seated at the Wobbliest table in an awful location. It took us forever to be asked about our drinks. Our waiter never checked up on ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Selepack
text:
Horribly untrained staff
Elizabeth had no customer service nor did she even know how to use the pos system

name: Cassie Maiko
text: Tried it for the first time and will not be going back. The 'bread' given to you as you wait is so hard I could have used it to take out a grown man. The pizzas arrived, but out of all three only one wasn't burnt. Besides burnt, no other ‚Ä¶More

name: Stacia Shields
text: Food good, service slow....

name: John Driscoll
text: Consistent menu

name: Jenna Johnson
text: The staff is wonderful. The service is kind of slow, but it's worth it!

name: Sarah Lang
text: I just ordered takeout and was told it would take about 10 to 15 minutes. I then waited 30 minutes for pasta with Alfredo sauce and mushrooms with a total of 3 tables seated and a seemly full wait staff. Very frustrating experience.

name: Shirley Mahorney
text: Great salads.  Been here 4 times. 2 times good service 2 times bad. Maybe chick fil a could be of assistance on service.

name: Leah Jones
text: Good food, painfully slow service if you sit at the bar.

name: Luther Walker
text: Had the pepperoni pizza and it was the best I have had the staff was professional and friendly

name: Amyan Sindy
text: Food was nasty. Service sucked. Never going back.

name: Kelvin Harper
text: The best and most unique pizza place I've ever experienced. Must go back.

name: Andrew Becks
text: Love the thin crust üçï

name: MAURO Valdes
text:
We ordered appetizer and food for our two babies, they ended up bringing at the end, I guess on a busy day things happen and we all understand, but the manager took care of the situation, we will come back!
Also the waiter was great!

name: Jerry Lyles
text: Hostess was picking her nose and she talked to us, she told us it would be a 30 minute wait to be seated but about 70% of the place had no one in the seats, we finally got a seat, entire staff was disorganized and clueless, if service and overall attitude doesn't improve it will be another empty spot in the Mall again.

name: Paul Schmitz
text: Great food, great service,  cool restaurant.

name: Meraj Ahmed
text: I love CPK, but it seems like this new location is still working on ironing out a few kinks. I expected it to be busy on a Saturday evening, but the service was slower than expected, and the server made a few mistakes. He was apologetic, ‚Ä¶More

name: Alexandra Pearson
text: I waited about 10 mins for the server to come by and after that it was waiting for my drink (which was wrong), my food which was extremely greasy, my salad was limp. The server came by twice and brought me the correct drink and set it down ‚Ä¶More

name: Right Near The Beach
text: Awesome pizza and a amazing staff. Will be returning!!

name: Alisha Zimmerman
text: üëç

name: Colt B
text: Good eats

name: CASEY ROACH
text: More crust than pizza and hardly any toppings.  Ridiculous for a small $15 pizza.  I won't be back.

name: Jamie Higdon
text: Great spot

name: Hanz Rucker
text: Great service

name: Wes Maynord
text: Great margarita pizza

name: jimmie mcgee
text: Great food

name: Sathiya
text: Tasty tasty

name: Sonia Ivette Lugo
text: Fabulous

name: Sonal Swaroop
text: Delicious menu
